name: Arsenic
educationalNotes: Arsenic is a poison historically used to assassinate royalty - invisible and tasteless! Arsenite and arsenate are extremely toxic. Yet arsenic compounds are used in semiconductors (gallium arsenide LEDs). Arsenic-74 radioactive form used in medical imaging. Chronic low-level exposure causes cancer. Contaminated groundwater in Bangladesh poisons millions. Arsenic accumulates in rice grown in contaminated soil. Discovered in ancient times but properties misunderstood.
